lodging.name: Four-Star Beach Resort
lodging.description: Luxury beachfront resort with world-class amenities. Located on Yellow Leaf Bay with pristine white sand beaches. Features multiple dining options, full-service spa, infinity pool, and spacious rooms with private balconies.

lodging.name: Family-Owned Hotel
lodging.description: Comfortable mid-range hotel perfect for families. Features family-sized rooms, complimentary breakfast, children's pool area, and friendly local staff who know the best family activities on the island.

lodging.name: Island Inn Hotel
lodging.description: Centrally located in Taniti City, this comfortable hotel offers easy access to shops, restaurants, and attractions. Modern rooms with all the essentials for a pleasant stay.

lodging.name: Cozy Bed & Breakfast
lodging.description: Experience authentic Tanitian hospitality at this charming B&B run by a local family. Enjoy home-cooked meals featuring fresh local ingredients and get insider tips on the best spots to visit.

lodging.name: Rainforest Retreat B&B
lodging.description: Nestled in the lush rainforest, this peaceful B&B offers a tranquil escape. Wake up to birdsong and enjoy breakfast on the terrace overlooking the forest canopy.

lodging.name: Budget Hostel
lodging.description: Clean and affordable hostel perfect for budget travelers and backpackers. Meet fellow travelers in the common areas and enjoy the social atmosphere. Both dorm beds and private rooms available.

lodging.name: Merriton Landing Boutique Hotel
lodging.description: Stylish boutique hotel in the heart of Merriton Landing, close to restaurants, pubs, and entertainment. Features contemporary rooms with local art and a trendy rooftop bar.

lodging.name: Yellow Leaf Bay Harbor Hotel
lodging.description: Elegant hotel overlooking the harbor with stunning water views. Popular with both tourists and business travelers. Walking distance to downtown Taniti City.
